OverTaps were conceived and developed by Denise Caston-Clark. Denise's vision was to create covers for tap shoes so tap dancers can quietly warm up backstage, dancers can safely walk from the dressing room to the stage, tap teachers can throw them on to go between studios, competition dancers can safely walk on the tile flooring at competition venues. At a hotel event? You don't have to take off your tap shoes to walk through the lobby. Just slip on your OverTaps! They are designed to last and to look good.
